= Documentations =

==Installation==

  <ol>
  <li>Unzip the CbModel zip and move the extracted directory in the libraries directory of processing.</li><br/>  
  <li>Import the library to any of your programs that use the CbModel library:
  Sketch -> Import Library and select CbModel.</li>  
  </ol>
